data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sinev, Artem Y., Tiang-Nga, Supatra, Sanoamuang, La-Orsri (2017): New genus of Cladocera of subfamily Aloninae (Anomopoda: Chydoridae) from the Mekong River. Zootaxa 4276 (3): 416-426, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4276.3.6|4 occurrences
